content: Oh, please let me hear your voice, the angel of salvation. Wonder if she talks to me and holds my body certainly. So, please let me hear your voice, the angel of salvation. Wonder if she takes on me, wonder if she gives her love to me. Oh, please let me hear your voice, the angel of salvation. Wonder if she talks to me and holds my body certainly. So, please let me hear your voice, the angel of salvation. Wonder if she takes on me. Wonder if she gives her love to me.
author: Galneryus
